Articles.Content: Any of you play astroneer? it's a pretty good game that's slightly unrealistic, but a pretty cute one at that. Let me know if you do in the comments and your opinions on the game. I like the character customization and events, even though i suck at the events lol.

I used to play Astroneer, and I sometimes wish I still had it. I would play it with all my friends, and we would rove around with our buggies and dig for resources. Sometimes I wish we could add new habitat structures to our base, instead of the single small habitat pod and the rows of solar panels and storage shelves.
I know! Shelter expansions would be cool! like, there could be byte boosts and stuff.
